You reach out and place your hands on the black orb, while entering a state of deep concentration. You feel your mind escaping from your body, flowing into the black orb. Like stepping out of a portal, you arrive inside a dark and damp dungeon. You see a beautiful girl chained to the cold stone walls, and an evil priest torturing her. Your vision becomes blurry, and you return to your body with a jerk, instinctively removing your hands from the orb.
